Detailed Description

Type: Class

Purpose: This is the general Xform for Multi Processing Elements.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Member Function Documentation

void CIccXformMpe::Apply ( CIccApplyXform *  pApply,
icFloatNumber *  DstPixel,
const icFloatNumber *  SrcPixel 
) const
virtual

Name: CIccXformMPE::Apply

Purpose: Does the actual application of the Xform.

Args: pApply = ApplyXform object containging temporary storage used during Apply DstPixel = Destination pixel where the result is stored, SrcPixel = Source pixel which is to be applied.

Implements CIccXform.

References CIccTagMultiProcessElement::Apply(), icAbsoluteColorimetric, icLabFromPcs(), icLabToPcs(), icSigLabData, icSigXYZData, icXyzFromPcs(), icXyzToPcs(), and CIccApplyXformMpe::m_pApply.

icStatusCMM CIccXformMpe::Begin ( )
virtual

Name: CIccXformMPE::Begin

Purpose: This function will be called before the xform is applied. Derived objects should also call the base class function to initialize for Absolute Colorimetric Intent handling which is performed through the use of the CheckSrcAbs and CheckDstAbs functions.

Reimplemented from CIccXform.

References CIccXform::Begin(), icCmmStatInvalidLut, icCmmStatInvalidProfile, and icCmmStatOk.

CIccXform * CIccXformMpe::Create ( CIccProfile *  pProfile,
bool  bInput = true,
icRenderingIntent  nIntent = icUnknownIntent,
icXformInterp  nInterp = icInterpLinear,
icXformLutType  nLutType = icXformLutColor,
CIccCreateXformHintManager *  pHintManager = NULL 
)
static

Note: The returned CIccXform will own the profile.

Name: CIccXformMPE::Create

Purpose: This is a static Creation function that creates derived CIccXform objects and initializes them.

Args: pProfile = pointer to a CIccProfile object that will be owned by the transform. This object will be destroyed when the returned CIccXform object is destroyed. The means that the CIccProfile object needs to be allocated on the heap. bInput = flag to indicate whether to use the input or output side of the profile, nIntent = the rendering intent to apply to the profile, nInterp = the interpolation algorithm to use for N-D luts. nLutType = selection of which transform lut to use pHintManager = hints for creating the xform

Return: A suitable pXform object

References icHeader::colorSpace, CIccProfile::FindTag(), CIccTag::GetType(), icAbsoluteColorimetric, icPerceptual, icRelativeColorimetric, icSig3colorData, icSig4colorData, icSigAToB0Tag, icSigBToA0Tag, icSigBToD0Tag, icSigBToD1Tag, icSigCmyData, icSigCmykData, icSigDToB0Tag, icSigDToB1Tag, icSigGamutTag, icSigHlsData, icSigHsvData, icSigLabData, icSigLuvData, icSigMultiProcessElementType, icSigNamedColor2Tag, icSigPreview0Tag, icSigRgbData, icSigXYZData, icSigYCbCrData, icSigYxyData, icUnknownIntent, icXformLutColor, icXformLutGamut, icXformLutNamedColor, icXformLutPreview, CIccTag::IsSupported(), CIccProfile::m_Header, icHeader::pcs, and CIccXform::SetParams().

CIccApplyXform * CIccXformMpe::GetNewApply ( icStatusCMM &  status)
virtual

Name: CIccXformMpe::GetNewApply

Purpose: This Factory function allocates data specific for the application of the xform. This allows multiple threads to simultaneously use the same xform.

Reimplemented from CIccXform.
